text:
I’m surprised their karaoke song selection has much more to choose than actual karaoke places! You get to sing for free when you order drinks but if you dare to in front of everyone in the public space 😂 the wait for your turn can be long when the place gets crowded. But it’s interesting how despite this, it’s still good to chat around your table and you can still hear everyone easily; the music volume is set to perfect

There is also darts machine around! Which is fun to play and chill with friends.

Food wise there isn’t anything special but just typical finger food. Price is average for bars.

The Sapporo beer is great though!

The staff are friendly and nice and quite attentive when it comes to passing the microphones and also changing the beer tower.

A great place!

One of my Favorite place to hang out with friends !!
Fun and enjoyable place to chill and games for darts
They have VIP room too, to host team, birthday gathering ☺️☺️☺️

Ona side note, Gotten my First Champion Board here in Forest 3 too !! Very Huat Huat place !!!

A good place for TGIF !!! ✨🙌🏻
Good n cosy place with helpful n friendly staff. Drinks price are reasonable. Huge space with plenty of dartboards n tip top karaoke system .
Friendly staff with great service , very relaxing while playing darts and great music🥳🙌🏻

This place is a hidden gem for darts lovers! With over 20 Dartslive 2 boards, there's never a wait to play, and the machines are top-notch. The atmosphere is vibrant, and the staff are super friendly and accommodating. The karaoke setup is just the cherry on top—perfect for a fun night out with friends. Drinks and snacks are reasonably priced, and the overall vibe is just unbeatable. Whether you're serious about darts or just looking for a great time, this place is a must-visit. Highly recommend!
